items.title: How to Follow the Trajectory of Comet 3I/Atlas
items.description: The interstellar comet 3I/Atlas reached its closest point to the sun. Here's how to follow the rest of its journey away from our solar system.

items.title: Mexico City Is the Most Video-Surveilled Metropolis in the Americas
items.description: Despite 83,000 public cameras, crime in Mexico City remains high—and widespread surveillance raises myriad ethical issues.

items.title: Top Verizon Promo Codes & Deals | November 2025
items.description: Save with our roundup of the best Verizon coupons for free iPhone 17 Pro up to $1,100 off new Galaxy phones, and plans up to 50% off this November.

items.title: Tesla to begin Cybercab production in April, Musk claims
items.description: Elon Musk said he expects Tesla to be able to put all the Cybercabs it builds on the road, and thanked Waymo for "paving the path."

items.title: Tesla delays reveal of production Roadster 2 to April Fools’ Day
items.description: Musk said he picked the date so he "could say I was just kidding" if it changes again. He had spent months teasing a reveal by the end of this year.
